name: Vehicle_Details

docs_row.name: Vehicle_Details
docs_row.func_description: Search the detail information of a car using `vehicle id`.

vehicle_id.description: Vehicle ID. vehicle_id can be retrieved from api/v1/cars/searchCarRentals(Search Car Rentals) endpoint in Car Rental collection as vehicle_id inside search_results object.

search_key.description: search_key can be retrieved from api/v1/cars/searchCarRentals(Search Car Rentals) endpoint in Car Rental collection as search_key.

units.description: The measurement of distance in metric or imperial.

currency_code.description: The currency code. currency_code can be retrieved from api/v1/meta/getCurrency(Get Currency) endpoint in Hotels collection.

languagecode.description:
To obtain the response data in a specific language, enter the languagecode. languagecode can be retrieved from api/v1/meta/getLanguages(Get Languages
) endpoint in Meta collection.

vehicle_id.description: Vehicle ID. vehicle_id can be retrieved from api/v1/cars/searchCarRentals(Search Car Rentals) endpoint in Car Rental collection as vehicle_id inside search_results object.

search_key.description: search_key can be retrieved from api/v1/cars/searchCarRentals(Search Car Rentals) endpoint in Car Rental collection as search_key.

units.description: The measurement of distance in metric or imperial.

currency_code.description: The currency code. currency_code can be retrieved from api/v1/meta/getCurrency(Get Currency) endpoint in Hotels collection.

languagecode.description:
To obtain the response data in a specific language, enter the languagecode. languagecode can be retrieved from api/v1/meta/getLanguages(Get Languages
) endpoint in Meta collection.

response_summary: The API encountered a "Bad Request" error with a status code of 400. This occurred when attempting to process a vehicle search request at the specified endpoint. The request included details such as the driver's age (30), a drop-off date and time (November 17, 2023, at 10:00 AM), and specific drop-off location coordinates (latitude 40.6397018432617, longitude -73.7791976928711). Unfortunately, the system was unable to fulfill this request due to invalid or improperly formatted parameters. The error was logged at the timestamp 1747651811473.
enhance_func_desc: This API is suitable for retrieving detailed information about specific rental vehicles. It fetches vehicle details based on a vehicle ID and search key obtained from the Search Car Rentals API. Users can specify units (metric/imperial), currency, and language preferences. The response includes comprehensive vehicle data such as pricing, features, and rental terms, aiding in informed rental decisions.

enhanced_parameters.vehicle_id: Unique identifier for the rental vehicle, sourced from searchCarRentals endpoint.
enhanced_parameters.search_key: Encoded search parameters including driver age, rental dates, and location.
enhanced_parameters.units: Specifies measurement system for distance (metric or imperial).
enhanced_parameters.currency_code: Currency for displaying rental prices and fees.
enhanced_parameters.languagecode: Language preference for the response data.

bgo_error.description: Contains detailed information about the error encountered during the API request.

error.description: A human-readable description of the error that occurred, in this case, 'Bad Request'.

timestamp.description: The Unix timestamp (in milliseconds) when the error was logged, indicating the exact time of occurrence.

status.description: The HTTP status code associated with the error, here it is 400 indicating a Bad Request.

path.description: The endpoint path where the error occurred, including encoded request parameters.

meta.description: Contains metadata about the API response, specifically the response status code.

response_code.description: The HTTP status code returned by the API, mirroring the status in the error object.
